SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT535
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account servicer (account servicing institution) to an account owner or its designated agent. The account servicer may be a local agent (sub-custodian) acting on behalf of their global custodian customer, or a custodian acting on behalf of an investment management institution or a broker/dealer.
This message is used to report, at a specified moment in time, the quantity and identification of financial instruments which the account servicer maintains for the account owner.
The statement is used to reconcile the books of the account owner and the account servicer for the specified safekeeping account or sub-safekeeping account.
This message may also be used to respond to a request for statement/status advice, ie, the MT 549 Request for Statement/Status Advice and to report that there are no holdings.
The custody statement is used for position reconciliation purposes. It may also report availability and/or the location of the financial instruments to facilitate trading and minimise settlement issues. The holdings may be valuated or not.
The accounting statement provides valuations of a financial instrument portfolio with valuation details for each instrument; this information can either be audited or un-audited. It is typically not used for trading purposes.

Validation.Comment: Continuation Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T97):

Code.Name: LAST
Code.Description: Last page of a statement with more than one page.

Code.Name: MORE
Code.Description: Intermediate page of a statement which contains additional pages.

Code.Name: ONLY
Code.Description: Only page of the statement.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86):

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Message requesting the cancellation of a previously sent message.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85):

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
If Qualifier is SFRE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ADHO
Code.Description: Statement is sent following a request by the Receiver.

Code.Name: DAIL
Code.Description: Statement is sent daily (once per day, end-of-day).

Code.Name: INDA
Code.Description: Statement is sent intra-day (multiple reports during the day).

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Statement is sent monthly (once per month).

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Statement is sent weekly (once per week).

Code.Name: YEAR
Code.Description: Statement is sent yearly (once per year).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CODE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: COMP
Code.Description: Statement gives complete information (including information (positions, instruction statuses) which is unchanged).

Code.Name: DELT
Code.Description: Statement contains changes which have not yet been reported (delta report, that is, changes only).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STTY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: Statement is an accounting statement.

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Statement is a custody statement.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STBA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CONT
Code.Description: Statement is based on contractual settlement date positions, irrespective of failed instructions.

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Statement is based on actual settlement date positions.

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Statement is based on trade date positions.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'.(Error code(s): T26).
Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17)

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'.(Error code(s): T26).
In option B, when Data Source Scheme is not present, Account Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K97):

Code.Name: ABRD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are held in a safekeeping account abroad.

Code.Name: CEND
Code.Description: Financial instrument in the safekeeping account are held in one location.

Code.Name: DVPA
Code.Description: Safekeeping account is used for settlement on delivery or collect on delivery basis.

Code.Name: MARG
Code.Description: Account is used when financing is by the broker/dealer.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are in physical form.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Account is used for short sale orders.

Validation.Comment: Narrative (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
Country must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: In option F, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a local custodian.

Code.Name: ICSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at an International Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: NCSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a National Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
Narrative (option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of listing is a stock exchange.

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of listing is over the counter.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MICO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: A001
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February, and provided that the interest period started on a 30th or a 31st. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th if the period started on a 30th or a 31st and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). It is the most commonly used 30/360 method for US straight and convertible bonds.

Code.Name: A002
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month in a way similar to the 30/360 (basic rule) and a 365-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th).

Code.Name: A003
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month in a way similar to the 30/360 (basic rule) and the assumed number of days in a year in a way similar to the Actual/Actual (ICMA). Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). The assumed number of days in a year is computed as the actual number of days in the coupon period multiplied by the number of interest payments in the year.

Code.Name: A004
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period and a 360-day year

Code.Name: A005
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period and a 365-day year

Code.Name: A006
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and the assumed number of days in a year, ie, the actual number of days in the coupon period multiplied by the number of interest payments in the year. If the coupon period is irregular (first or last coupon), it is extended or split into quasi interest periods that have the length of a regular coupon period and the computation is operated separately on each quasi interest period and the intermediate results are summed up.

Code.Name: A007
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be equivalent to a 30 Feb. However, if the last day of the maturity coupon period is the last day of February, it will not be assumed to be a 30th. It is a variation of the 30/360 (ICMA) method commonly used for eurobonds. The usage of this variation is only relevant when the coupon periods are scheduled to end on the last day of the month.

Code.Name: A008
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days of the interest period that fall on a normal year,divided by 365, added to the actual number of days of the interest period that fall on a leap year, divided by 366

Code.Name: A009
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and a 365-day year (if the coupon payment date is NOT in a leap year) or a 366-day year (if the coupon payment date is in a leap year).

Code.Name: A010
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and a 366-day year (if 29 Feb falls in the coupon period) or a 365-day year (if 29 Feb does not fall in the coupon period). If a coupon period is longer than one year, it is split by repetitively separating full year sub-periods counting backwards from the end of the coupon period (a year backwards from a 28 Feb being 29 Feb, if it exists). The first of the sub-periods starts on the start date of the accrued interest period and thus is possibly shorter than a year. Then the interest computation is operated separately on each sub-period and the intermediate results are summed up.

Code.Name: A011
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). It is the most commonly used 30/360 method for non-US straight and convertible bonds issued before 01/01/1999.

Code.Name: A012
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for the last day of February whose day of the month value shall be adapted to the value of the first day of the interest period if the latter is higher and if the period is one of a regular schedule. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28th Feb of a non-leap year is assumed to be equivalent to a 29th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 29th, or to a 30th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 30th or a 31st. The 29th Feb of a leap year is assumed to be equivalent to a 30th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 30th or a 31st. Similarly, if the coupon period starts on the last day of February, it is assumed to produce only one day of interest in February as if it was starting on a 30th Feb when the end of the period is a 30th or a 31st, or two days of interest in February when the end of the period is a 29th, or 3 days of interest in February when it is the 28th Feb of a non-leap year and the end of the period is before the 29th.

Code.Name: A013
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be equivalent to a 30 Feb. It is a variation of the 30E/360 (or Eurobond basis) method where the last day of February is always assumed to be a 30th, even if it is the last day of the maturity coupon period.

Code.Name: A014
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period, excluding any leap day from the count, and a 365-day year.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other method than A001-A014 . See Narrative.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is FORM and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BEAR
Code.Description: Financial instruments are in bearer form.

Code.Name: REGD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are in registered form.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PFRE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ANNU
Code.Description: Payment frequency is annual.

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Payment frequency is monthly.

Code.Name: QUTR
Code.Description: Payment frequency is quarterly.

Code.Name: SEMI
Code.Description: Payment frequency is semi-annual.

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Payment frequency is weekly.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PAYS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: FULL
Code.Description: Financial instrument is fully paid.

Code.Name: NILL
Code.Description: Financial instrument is nil paid.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Financial instrument is partially paid.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is CFRE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ANNU
Code.Description: Frequency is annual.

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Frequency is monthly.

Code.Name: QUTR
Code.Description: Frequency is quarterly.

Code.Name: SEMI
Code.Description: Frequency is semi-annual.

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Frequency is weekly.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is OPST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Instrument Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K12):

Code.Name: AMER
Code.Description: Option can be exercised before or on expiry date.

Code.Name: EURO
Code.Description: Option can be exercised on expiry date only.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is OPTI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Instrument Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K12):

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: A right to buy a defined quantity of an asset by a certain date at an agreed price.

Code.Name: PUTO
Code.Description: A right to sell a defined quantity of an asset by a certain date at an agreed price.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code(Error code(s): T52).

Validation.Qualifiers: CALD, COUP, DDTE, EXPI, FCOU, FRNR, ISSU, MATU, PUTT
Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).

Validation.Qualifiers: CUFC, INDX, INTR, NWFC, NXRT, PRFC, VAHA, YTMR
Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Rate must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Validation.Comment: Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, eg, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, eg, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAOP, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CASH
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to holders.

Code.Name: DRIP
Code.Description: Reinvestment proceeds into securities.

Validation.Comment: Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, eg, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, eg, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
If Qualifier is MRKT and format is option E, Price Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: UKWN
Code.Description: Though the statement is audited, the price value is unknown to the message sender.

Validation.Comment: Narrative must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
When Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: FUND
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is a fund (transfer agent, fund itself, etc.).

Code.Name: LMAR
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is the market.

Code.Name: THEO
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is a theoretical value based on the market yield.

Code.Name: VEND
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is an external vendor.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must contain a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
When Sign is present, Balance must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
If Data Source Scheme is not present, Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K93):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity is expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Qualifiers: BLCA, BLOK, BLOT, BLOV, BODE, BORE, BORR, CLEN, COLI, COLO, DIRT, DRAW, ISSU, LOAN, LODE, LORE, MARG, NOMI, OTHR, PECA, PEDA, PEND, PENR, PLED, QUAS, REGO, RSTR, SPOS, TRAN, UNRG
Validation.Comment: If format is option C, Balance Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K93):

Code.Name: AVAI
Code.Description: Sub-balance reported quantity is available.

Code.Name: NAVL
Code.Description: Sub-balance reported quantity is not available.

Validation.Qualifiers: AGGR, AVAI, AWAS, BLCA, BLOK, BLOT, BLOV, BODE, BORE, BORR, CLEN, COLA, COLI, COLO, DIRT, DRAW, ISSU, LOAN, LODE, LORE, MARG, NAVL, NOMI, OTHR, PECA, PEDA, PEND, PENR, PLED, QUAS, REGO, RSTR, SPOS, TRAN, UNRG
Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K93):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Qualifiers: AGGR, AVAI, AWAS, BLCA, BLOK, BLOT, BLOV, BODE, BORE, BORR, CLEN, COLA, COLI, COLO, DIRT, DRAW, ISSU, LOAN, LODE, LORE, MARG, NAVL, NOMI, OTHR, PECA, PEDA, PEND, PENR, PLED, QUAS, REGO, RSTR, SPOS, TRAN, UNRG
Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Balance must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Country must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

In option B, if Qualifier is PRIC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: FUND
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is a fund (transfer agent, fund itself, etc.).

Code.Name: LMAR
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is the market.

Code.Name: THEO
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is a theoretical value based on the market yield.

Code.Name: VEND
Code.Description: Source of price quotation is an external vendor.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is SAFE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of financial instrument.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is PLIS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of listing is a stock exchange.

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of listing is over the counter.

Validation.Comment: In option F, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a local custodian.

Code.Name: ICSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at an International Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: NCSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a National Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of financial instrument.

Validation.Comment: Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, eg, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, eg, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
If Qualifier is MRKT and format is option E, Price Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: UKWN
Code.Description: Though the statement is audited, the price value is unknown to the message sender.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must contain a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
When Sign is present, Number must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
First Currency Code and Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency codes (Error code(s): T52).
First Currency Code and Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency codes (Error code(s): T52).
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K93):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, for example, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Balance must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, for example, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, for example, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
If Qualifier is PRIC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AVER
Code.Description: Price is an average price.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03)
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
When Sign is present, Number must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
First Currency Code and Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency codes (Error code(s): T52).
First Currency Code and Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency codes (Error code(s): T52).
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K93):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, for example, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Balance must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, for example, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, for example, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
If Qualifier is PRIC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AVER
Code.Description: Price is an average price.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03)
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is N, then sequence B must not be present. Otherwise, sequence B is mandatory (Error code(s): E66).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is N, then sequence B must not be present. Otherwise, sequence B is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 If the statement refers to an accounting statement, that is, if field :22F::STTY//ACCT is present, then at least one occurrence of subsequence B1 is required. This check only applies when sequence B Sub-safekeeping Account is present as per rule (see rule C1), that is, when in sequence A, field :17B::ACTI = Y.(Error code(s): E67).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the statement refers to an accounting statement, that is, if field :22F::STTY//ACCT is present, then at least one occurrence of subsequence B1 is required. This check only applies when sequence B Sub-safekeeping Account is present as per rule (see rule C1), that is, when in sequence A, field :17B::ACTI = Y.(Error code(s): E67)."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3: "In each occurrence of subsequence B1, if NO subsequence B1b is present, then both fields Price (field :90a:) and Holding Value (field :19A::HOLD) must be specified in subsequence B1.In each occurrence of subsequence B1, if one or more occurrence of subsequence B1b are present, then both fields Price (field :90a:) and Holding Value (field :19A::HOLD) must be specified in each occurrence of subsequence B1b.This check only applies when the statement refers to an accounting statement (see rule C2), that is, if field :22F::STTY//ACCT is present."(Error codes: E82)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of subsequence B1, if NO subsequence B1b is present, then both fields Price (field :90a:) and Holding Value (field :19A::HOLD) must be specified in subsequence B1.In each occurrence of subsequence B1, if one or more occurrence of subsequence B1b are present, then both fields Price (field :90a:) and Holding Value (field :19A::HOLD) must be specified in each occurrence of subsequence B1b.This check only applies when the statement refers to an accounting statement (see rule C2), that is, if field :22F::STTY//ACCT is present."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only in one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed (Error code(s): E08).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If in sequence A field :17B::CONS=Y, then in every occurrence of sequence B field :97a::SAFE and field :17B::ACTI are mandatory (Error code(s): E56). This check only applies when sequence B Sub-safekeeping Account is present per rule C1, ie, in sequence A, field:17B::ACTI=Y.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is Y and if field :17B::CONS in sequence A is also Y, then in every occurrence of sequence B field :97a::SAFE and field :17B::ACTI are mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.comment: C6 If the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) in sequence B Sub-safekeeping Account indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then subsequence B1 Financial Instrument must not be present. Subsequence B1 Financial Instrument is otherwise mandatory (Error code(s): E69). This check only applies when sequence B Sub-safekeeping Account is present per rule C1, ie, in sequence A, field :17B::ACTI=Y.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is Y and if the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) in sequence B Sub-safekeeping Account indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then subsequence B1 Financial Instrument must not be present. Subsequence B1 Financial Instrument is otherwise mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 If field :94a:: is present in Sequence B, then field :93B::AGGR and fields :94a::SAFE are not allowed in any occurrence of Subsequence B1b (Error code(s): D03).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field :94a:: is present in Sequence B, then field :93B::AGGR and field :94a::SAFE are not allowed in any occurrence of Subsequence B1b."

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: C8 If field :93B::AGGR is present in Subsequence B1b, then :field 94a::SAFE must be present in the same Subsequence B1b sequence (Error code(s): D04).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field :93B::AGGR is present in Subsequence B1b, then :field 94a::SAFE must be present in the same Subsequence B1b sequence."

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 In each occurrence of Subsequence B1b, if field :93B::AVAI or/and :93B::NAVL is/are present, then :field :93B::AGGR must be present in the same occurrence of Subsequence B1b (Error code(s): D05).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Subsequence B1b, if field :93B::AVAI or/and :93B::NAVL is/are present, then :field :93B::AGGR must be present in the same occurrence of Subsequence B1b."

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 In each occurrence of subsequence B1, field :93B::AGGR cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR (Error code(s): C71).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of subsequence B1, field :93B::AGGR cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR (Error code(s): C71)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB1-35B-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB1-35B-A ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB1-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";

fieldvalidation.name: FB1a-35B-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB1a-35B-A ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB1a-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";
